title: Lesson 23
paragraph: Authenticity and the right tools matter in creation and performance. Using genuine equipment, capable devices, and proper output ensures reliable results in every task.

words.meaning: truly what something is claimed to be
words.example: He gave a genuine apology for his mistake.
She added a coment to clarify her point.

words.meaning: a tool or piece of equipment
words.example: The scientist tested the new device carefully.

words.meaning: a person who establishes an organization
words.example: The founder of the company retired last year.

words.meaning: approximately or with a coarse surface
words.example: There were roughly 50 participants in the event.
The software is outputtable in multiple formats.
The company hosted a banquet for its employees.
He has a liberal attitude toward new ideas.

words.meaning: having the ability to do something
words.example: She is capable of handling complex tasks.
